attributes.action: Stop the sale of ouija board occult tool games being sold in toy departments of shops including Toys r Us and other Childrens toy stores world wide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the prime minister or Government to ban the sale of occult tools such as Ouija boards to be sold in toy departments world wide aimed at the sole child industry for profit. Toys r Us stores are stocking this in the board game section of their stores and many other toy shops are also stocking this occult tool game in their game section

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
